item.title: A brick fell from the roof on my hand, 28th June
item.description:
As I was walking my dog past 283 Kingsland Road (corner with Orsman Road), a brick fell and hit my hand. I believe it was dislodged from the roof â€” no one else was involved, but it could have caused serious harm. I informed the bar next door and the polic

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Road neens sweeping, 28th June
item.description:
Hi as a resident in monnow Road se15rq, we have noticed that there have not been any cleaners around for over a month, and the Road and path ways are full of tree mess, I have attached some photos of the road, it's bad as we keep bringing it in our homes on our feet and it blows everywhere, please can someone look in to this, regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Monnow Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unwanted wheelie bins, 28th June
item.description:
Three wheelie bins (2 blue, one white) which are not required by any residents of 13 to 22 Kingfisher Close have been emptied and placed upside down at the rear of no 17 Kingfisher Close, in the parking area, to signify their that they are not required. Please could you arrange for them to be collected. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingfisher Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass needs cutting, 28th June
item.description:
The entrance to Jubilee park on Southborough lane opposite Oxhawth crescent , the path leading to the entrance had been cleared but it is almost impossible to get in the park further down without getting scratched by the overgrown bushes.The grass is overgrown as well and has covered the pathway. Residents of Southborough lane and their children do use that entrance a lot. Very dangerous for pushchairs users. Can you please make it safe. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Discarded television, 28th June
item.description:
The TV has been smashed and has been sitting on the street for weeks.. It is a trip hazard, blocks the path and could release hazardous materials into the environment

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Osbaldeston Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Duke of Wellington pub, 28th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95-97, Crawford Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Fallen trees in allotment landing into private garden., 28th June
item.description:
Large tree fell down at the back of our garden damaging fences and landing into rear of garden which we wasn't aware of until we started to clear out the back of our garden. The tree is on council property and is part of the knoll road allotment.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Studley Court, London

item.title: Bike frame attached to bike stand, 28th June
item.description:
